Description:
You discover what looks like an altar devoted to the main surface loas on a small rocky island in the middle of the sea. 

The storm has taken its toll on the altar, leaving it broken, but fortunately, its pieces are scattered around the area, and with a little effort, you could restore it. 

Of course, you could just use it in its current state, but you’ll have to offer an additional amount of shards for your pleas to have any effect.
DescriptionAction: Would you like to pray at this altar?
